issuer.comment: number of hash functions: 7 if fpr==0.01, 6 if fpr==0.02,0.03, 5 if fpr==0.04,0.05, 4 if fpr is 0.1, 3 if fpr is 0.2, 2 if fpr is 0.3,0.4,0.5, 1 if fpr is 0.6 or more

blockchain.comment2: 158.39.200.125:8545 corresponds to ganache blockchain running at nrec
blockchain._comment: use ganache blockchain address (deployed locally) as endpoint

account._comment: sender info - account used in ganache to deploy smart contract

logger._comment1: ouput:<console> - for printing in console, <file> - for writing to file
logger._comment: env is used to configure the logger level at zapper. <dev> for devlopment, <prod> for production
